text: Chevrolet Blazer (and GMC Jimmy) can refer to one of several SUV models from General Motors: * Chevrolet K5 Blazer, based on the C/K pickup chassis and built from 1969 to 1994. It was replaced by the Chevrolet Tahoe in 1995. * Chevrolet S-10 Blazer, based on the S-10 pickup and built from 1983 to 2005. * Chevrolet TrailBlazer, originally 200cm and a trim package on the S-10 Blazer until 2002, when it became its own, larger model. * Chevrolet Tahoe, replaced the K5 Blazer, also sold in Argentina, Brazil, Ecuador and Venezuela as the "Grand Blazer" from 1990 to 2000.
title: Chevrolet Blazer
